## Dataset

```{r}
# clear environment
rm(list = ls())

# Load dataset
train_original <- read.csv('../dataset/DFC_STATE.csv')

# Make a working copy
train_data <- train_original
```

## Libraries

```{r, warning=FALSE}
# install.packages("DataExplorer")
library(DataExplorer)
```

## Create EDA Report

```{r}
# Create HTML report
create_report(train_data)
create_report(
  train_data,
  output_file = "report.html",
  #output_dir = "docs/",
  config = configure_report(),
  report_title = "Exploratory Data Analysis"
)
```
